entry.title: Newsletter #109
entry.content:
Yo folks!

This week we bid farewell to one of our team member Nitesh, he posted an interesting summary of his delightful journey at Namshi, we wish him best of luck.

Below you can find the usual list of interesting articles we discovered in the past 7 days.

entry.title: Newsletter #58
entry.content:
Hello, It’s #TechThursday at #namshi again!

News from the IT Team:

Our fella Hallal is back from Symfony Live London and he wrote a nice recap, go and check it out.

But what has the team been looking at over the past week? Below you’ll find the usual list of interesting articles we discovered in the past 7 days.

  • When Logstash and Syslog go wrong

  • Docker Networking

  • Infrastructure automation by example

  • I Am Not a Coder
